solarproducts.name: SunPower (Maxeon Series)
solarproducts.description: SunPower's Maxeon solar panels are among the most efficient in the industry. They are known for their long lifespan, durability, and excellent performance in low-light conditions.

solarproducts.name: LG Solar (NeON Series)
solarproducts.description: LG's NeON series offers high efficiency and advanced technology, including excellent performance in low-light conditions. Their panels are also known for their attractive design and durability.

solarproducts.name: Canadian Solar (HiKu Series)
solarproducts.description: Canadian Solar is known for its reliable and affordable panels. The HiKu series features high efficiency and performance, with a strong focus on cost-effectiveness for residential and commercial installations.

solarproducts.name: First Solar (Series 6)
solarproducts.description: First Solar specializes in thin-film technology and is a leader in large-scale utility installations. The Series 6 panels provide excellent energy yield in hot and dry climates, with a focus on sustainability.

solarproducts.name: REC Group (Alpha Series)
solarproducts.description: REC's Alpha series is known for its high efficiency and performance. With a reputation for durability and quality, these panels are a great option for both residential and commercial installations.

solarproducts.name: Trina Solar (Vertex Series)
solarproducts.description: Trina Solar's Vertex series offers high power output and efficiency, making it a popular choice for both residential and commercial systems. These panels are known for their strong performance and competitive pricing.

solarproducts.name: Enphase IQ8+
solarproducts.description: A high-performance microinverter with advanced grid support capabilities and rapid shutdown compliance.

solarproducts.name: SolarEdge SE7600H
solarproducts.description: A single-phase HD-Wave inverter known for its high efficiency and lightweight design.

solarproducts.name: SMA Sunny Boy 6.0-US
solarproducts.description: A reliable transformerless string inverter with integrated Secure Power Supply.

solarproducts.name: Fronius Primo 5.0-1
solarproducts.description: A flexible and efficient residential inverter with Wi-Fi monitoring and energy management functions.

solarproducts.name: Growatt MIN 6000TL-X
solarproducts.description: A compact and efficient residential solar inverter with smart monitoring capabilities.

solarproducts.name: Huawei SUN2000-6KTL-L1
solarproducts.description: A smart inverter with AI-powered arc fault protection and high efficiency.

solarproducts.name: Tesla Powerwall 2
solarproducts.description: A high-capacity lithium-ion battery with seamless backup power and smart energy management.

solarproducts.name: LG Chem RESU 10H
solarproducts.description: A compact and efficient lithium-ion solar battery designed for residential energy storage.

solarproducts.name: Enphase Encharge 10
solarproducts.description: An all-in-one AC-coupled storage system with modular design and smart grid compatibility.

solarproducts.name: BYD Battery-Box Premium HV
solarproducts.description: A scalable lithium iron phosphate battery system offering high efficiency and safety.

solarproducts.name: Sonnen Eco 10
solarproducts.description: A durable and smart energy storage solution with advanced load management.

solarproducts.name: Simpliphi PHI 3.8
solarproducts.description: A compact lithium iron phosphate battery known for its reliability and long cycle life.
